PartyFinancialAsset.name: PartyFinancialAsset
PartyFinancialAsset.description: Represents information about the financial asset owned by an individual or account.

ApplicantId.description: The applicant associated with the financial asset.

AssetId.description: The asset owned by the party.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

DeclarationDateTime.description: The date when the asset is declared.

IsLienExisting.description: Indicate whether there is a lien on the financial asset.

IsReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the party financial asset is read only (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

MakeName.description: The make name of the asset.

ModelName.description: The model name of the asset.

ModelYear.description: The model year of the asset.

Name.description: The name of the party financial asset.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the party financial asset record.

OwnershipEndDateTime.description: The date and time when the ownership of the asset ends.

OwnershipPercent.description: The share owned by the party in percentage.

OwnershipStartDateTime.description: The date and time when the ownership of the asset starts.

OwnershipType.description: The ownership type of the asset.

PartyId.description: The party that owns the asset.

PartyProfileId.description: The party profile that owns the financial asset.

PayoffDueAmount.description: The payoff due amount of the party financial asset.

PledgeAmount.description: The amount the party pledges as a collateral against a financial asset.

PurchaseAmount.description: The amount the party paid for the financial asset.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the financial asset.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the party asset in an external system.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the party financial asset.

ValuationAmount.description: The worth of the asset after valuation.

VerificationDate.description: The date when the asset valuation was done.

ValuationDateTime.description: The date and time when the asset valuation was done.

VerificationStatus.description: The verification status of the party financial asset.
